name: Combat Mission: Beyond Overlord
description: This game requires dgVoodoo2 for Graphic Card detection.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Combat Mission - Beyond Overlord/Combat Mission.exe

files.installer: N/A:Select the Setup executable from your CD:

content:
script:
  files:
  - dgvoodoo: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dgvoodoo_2.55.4_dx1-7.tar.xz
  - installer: 'N/A:Select the Setup executable from your CD:'
  game:
    arch: win32
    exe: drive_c/Program Files/Combat Mission - Beyond Overlord/Combat Mission.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    task: null
  - app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_43 and d3dcompiler_47...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    task: null
  - arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    task: null
  - name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    task: null
  - dst: drive_c/Program Files/Combat Mission - Beyond Overlord/
    extract: null
    file: dgvoodoo
  - file: drive_c/Program Files/Combat Mission - Beyond Overlord/dgVoodoo.conf
    key: dgVoodooWatermark
    section: DirectX
    value: false
    write_config: null
wine:
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: native
